details.sectionContent: This Workshop is conducted by a Category Expert and Researcher wherein the students will be taught to make a Transformer along with a bunch of Complimentary concepts and Technical Skills to get ready for Industrial Level.

Get acquainted with the full _edged In-Detail Tutorial on Transformer & by Building a Transformer with Category Expert & Researcher Mr. Anand Panchbhai. Students will also get the detailed Information and Statistical data of How the Transmission Lines Work & Electrical Power Generation from Water to the one that we use at our Residence.

Topics to be Covered in this Workshop : o What is Transformer? o How the Electricity is Generated? o How the Electricity is transmitted from Power station to our House? ( In-Depth) o Industrial Manufacturing Of Transformer o Industrial Transformer & Heavy Duty Transformers ( In-Detail) WORKFLOW for the Workshop : 1. Full Tutorial on above-mentioned topics. 2. Distribution of Transformer Kits. 3. Instructions & Step by Step Guide to making a Transformer ( Will be taught Individually ). 4. Troubleshooting the Transformer. 5. Check the working Transformer on 230V AC.
